AdminNotification.PluginDescription: Places a message on all user's dashboards.
AdminNotification.EnabledSettingDescription: If enabled, the provided message will be displayed to users upon login. (Logoff/Logon required for â‰¥ v3.x)
AdminNotification.MessageSettingDescription: Message to display to users. Supports a minimal set of markdown.
AdminNotification.MessageSettingHelp: See plugin documentation for supported markdown.
AdminNotification.ContextSettingDescription: Sets what type of message should be displayed (affects color).
AdminNotification.TitleSettingDescription: Sets the title of the message. This will be displayed in bold with the message.
AdminNotification.TypeSettingDescription: Persistent (display until user closes the notification), Transient (displays once, disappear on page reload) or Toast (displayed for a few seconds, and the fades out)
